item.title: Another hot afternoon can be expected, with a Heat Advisory
item.description: Another hot afternoon can be expected, with a Heat Advisory in effect for portions of the lowlands, including Charleston, Huntington, and Parkersburg. Take precautions to protect yourself and others from the heat this afternoon.
